title: How to Make a Hummingbird Drink

steps.headline: Pour the rum cream liquor into a blender.
Pour the coffee liquor into the blender.
Pour the milk into the blender.
Pour the strawberry syrup into the blender.
Drop half of a banana into the blender.
Dump the crushed ice into the blender.
Blend until the mix runs smooth.

text: Pour the rum cream liquor into a blender.  Pour the coffee liquor into the blender.  Pour the milk into the blender.  Pour the strawberry syrup into the blender.  Drop half of a banana into the blender.  Dump the crushed ice into the blender.  Blend until the mix runs smooth.  Serve in a glass.
